The disturbance in the markings remains a mystery to p_l, and when {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} reports the incident, extra patrols are assigned to monitor for any further disruptions.

intro_text: On border patrol, the patrol finds a kittypet's scent. Following the (extremely) obvious sounds of distress, p_l leads the patrol down to a kittypet, haplessly wedged between a couple of rocks. Wailing pathetically, they cry that their wing is stuck!
decline_text: It's beyond c_n's border, it's not c_n's problem.

success_outcomes.text: Cats don't normally come with wings, much less bat ones, and the patrol flinches back from the foreign stranger. But unnatural or not, the stranger's still stuck, and with a deep breath, p_l orders them forward to free a fellow cat... ish... thing.

Frankly, extra limbs or not (bat wings, at that - this'll make a great story back at camp), the patrol needs to get this plump crying ball of fur back to their Twolegs. The world will eat this kittypet alive if they don't help them.

fail_outcomes.text: Falling over, paws waving helplessly in the air and somehow making the situation even worse, the patrol passes the mouse-brained kittypet by, leaving them to their stupidity while they focus on their actual task.

antag_fail_outcomes.text: Swaggering up, p_l tries to intimidate the kittypet. But while the cat is easily successfully frightened, that doesn't make them any less stuck in place, and eventually the patrol is forced to help set them free, if only so they can leave c_n's borders.

antag_success_outcomes.text: Hissing, p_l bowls the kittypet over, and with a ripping sound, the bat wing detaches from their back. The plump cat's crying increases in volume as they flee. p_l brings the trophy back to camp to boast.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol cautiously heads in the direction of the strange, motionless eyes. The cats see an eerie face with glowing eyes in the distance, baring its fangs and smelling of smoke. p_l creeps up to the face to find that it belongs to a pumpkin! Spooked, r_c suggests heading back to camp to report this bizarre finding to the Clan. p_l agrees, not wanting to be near this... thing... any longer.

The patrol cautiously heads in the direction of the strange, motionless eyes. When p_l gets closer {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/are/is} overwhelmed with the scent of Twolegs and smoke. Thankfully the kits scatter before they set the pumpkin ablaze.

The patrol nervously heads towards the unblinking eyes, unsure of what lies ahead. intro_text: The patrol stumbles upon a strange scene near a Twolegplace: Twoleg kits traveling from den to den in colorful pelts.
decline_text: The patrol decides it's best not to interfere with this peculiar ritual.

success_outcomes.text: r_c, being ever so curious, decides to see if {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} can decipher the meaning behind this Twoleg ritual. After some time, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/realize/realizes} it's some kind of friendly exchange. Each time the Twoleg kits go to the den, they receive a bit of prey from the older Twolegs. intro_text: On the outskirts of the territory, the patrol comes across a tall, motionless Twoleg rooted in the middle of a field.

s_c sneaks up behind the Twoleg. With a mighty roar, s_c leaps onto its back and {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} momentum sends both of them to the ground. s_c ends up covered in hay, {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} claws sunk into a harmless scarecrow.

intro_text: Come on! It'll be fun, p_l insists. All of the warriors are asleep, and nobody will notice if a few apprentices sneak out for a bit of night exploration.
decline_text: p_l might be ready to go on an adventure, but that doesn't mean {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} fellow apprentices feel the same. Instead of breaking the rules, everyone agrees to stay in camp.

success_outcomes.text: The moon is high overhead as the gaggle of apprentices dash about the territory, elated to be able to run and play freely without their mentors around to stop them! It's a long, pleasant night, and everyone returns to camp satisfied...if a little tired.

p_l and the other apprentices are goofing off deep in c_n territory when they smell an unfamiliar scent. Stealth, they all decide, is for cowards. They charge forward as a group all shouting in hopes of scaring off the stranger. The trespassing rogue doesn't stand a chance. They immediately flee from the gang of unruly apprentices, who return to camp proud to have protected c_n.

p_l and the other apprentices are so distracted by their games that they don't even notice when they cross the o_c_n border! r_c notices a second too late and points it out to the group. Instead of retreating, the apprentices all agree that a little exploration wouldn't hurt. They manage to poke around o_c_n territory, feeling like spies. Eventually they return to camp, triumphant that their trespass went undiscovered.

The darkness makes the night mysterious. The apprentices slip through the territory, hearts pounding with exhilaration. There's something so thrilling about the pools of darkness and the wind whispering through the territory. It's a perfect night for hide-and-seek. The group spends the night playing, sneaking into their nests just before dawn breaks. What a fun night!

fail_outcomes.text: The apprentices barely make it two rabbit hops out of camp before they end up nose to nose with a warrior! It seems a night patrol was sent out, and p_l and the others are brought back to camp before the adventure can even begin.

p_l and the other apprentices are so distracted by their games that they don't even notice when they cross the o_c_n border! app1 notices a second too late and points it out to the group. Instead of retreating, the apprentices agree that a little exploration wouldn't hurt...but the patrol of enemy warriors that discovers them does not. A battle breaks out and the apprentices eventually flee, returning to camp battered and embarrassed.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after being attacked by an enemy warrior.

fail_outcomes.text: p_l and the other apprentices are so distracted by their games that they don't even notice when they cross the o_c_n border! app1 notices a second too late and points it out to the group. Instead of retreating, the apprentices agree that a little exploration wouldn't hurt...but the patrol of enemy warriors that discovers them does not. The apprentices are escorted back to c_n's camp, humiliated when the o_c_n warriors insist on reporting their trespass. They're going to be in so much trouble!

The moon is high overhead as the gaggle of apprentices dash about the territory, elated to be able to run and play freely. They're all so distracted by their games that they don't notice the sudden rush of dog scent. What started as a night of adventure quickly becomes a night of tragedy as a pair of giant hounds attacks the group. The apprentices flee, pausing only long enough to help their injured friends back to camp.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} injuries after a dog attack.
history_text.scar: m_c was scarred after being attacked by a dog.

fail_outcomes.text: The moon is high overhead as the gaggle of apprentices dash about the territory, elated to be able to run and play freely. They're all so distracted by their games that they don't notice the sudden rush of dog scent. What started as a night of adventure quickly becomes a night of tragedy as a pair of giant hounds attacks the group. The surviving apprentices flee, hearts breaking as they leave their friends behind.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died during a dog attack.
